thread.title: See Hot Mug Shot Guy, Jeremy Meeks, Walk in His First Fashion Show
thread.title_full: See Hot Mug Shot Guy, Jeremy Meeks, Walk in His First Fashion Show

title: See Hot Mug Shot Guy, Jeremy Meeks, Walk in His First Fashion Show
text:
See Hot Mug Shot Guy, Jeremy Meeks, Walk in His First Fashion Show By Monica Schipper The no-longer-in-prison up-and-coming male model made his New York Fashion Week debut. 
Jeremy Meeks a.k.a. hot convict , a.k.a. prison bae, a.k.a. world's hottest felon, a.k.a. hot mugshot guy, made his New York Fashion Week debut yesterday walking for designer Philipp Plein. Meeks struck Internet gold two years ago when the Stockton, CA police department posted his mugshot to their Facebook page (what a time to be alive). Still incarcerated for gun possession at the time, Meeks made the most of his fame signing a modeling contract with White Cross Management. Since his release last March the blue-eyed dynamo has been keeping a growing throng of thirsty fans abreast of his projects via Instagram . 
He went to the beach three times! He chilled in a Maserati! He even posed for a picture with Anwar Hadid (baby bro to Gigi and Bella)! Things were looking up. But the world needed more of Jeremy Meeks. 
And boy, did they get it. Even Tiffany Trump, who sat front row alone, got an eyeful of Meeks as he executed his trademark sexy squint. Some might say the catwalk couldn't contain his sexinessâ€”we weren't there so we can't technically make the call. Others will say this is the beginning of a new chapter for the hot convict, one that we hope lets him drop any mention of prison from his name. Watch Now: How to Look More Like a Male Model (or at Least Get His Hair)
